name: Dragon Ride L'Etape Wales

difficulty.label: Legendary
difficulty.technical: Challenging mountain roads with steep gradients

description: Hailed as the UK's toughest and most prestigious cycling sportive, Dragon Ride takes 4,500 brave riders through the dramatic peaks of the Brecon Beacons. For 2026, routes are reversed, transforming legendary descents into punishing new climbs. The infamous Devil's Elbow returns as a timed King and Queen of the Mountain challenge. From the Gran Fondo's 4,000m of climbing to the epic 300km Dragon Devil, every route delivers world-class cycling through landscapes that will host the 2027 Tour de France Grand Départ. This isn't just a ride—it's a pilgrimage for cyclists who want to test themselves against one of Europe's most demanding courses.
who_its_for: Strong, experienced cyclists seeking a serious challenge. The Cymru Classic suits improvers; Gran Fondo and Dragon Devil are for seasoned sportive riders with excellent fitness.
whats_special: 2027 Tour de France Grand Départ scenery
King & Queen of the Mountain timed climbs

fee.notes: Price varies by route and entry tier

entry.notes: Final release of places in Spring 2026. Event typically sells out.
